subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lydia Ko, 16, took a share of the lead in her first start as an L.P.G.A. Tour member, with a five-under-par 68 on Thursday in the season-opening Bahamas L.P.G.A. Classic.
snippet: Lydia Ko, 16, took a share of the lead in her first start as an L.P.G.A. Tour member, with a five-under-par 68 on Thursday in the season-opening Bahamas L.P.G.A. Classic.
